00014 #include <stdlib.h>

00016 #include <math.h>
00017 #include <complex.h>  // Must be before fftw3.h
00018 #include <fftw3.h>
00019 #include "purify_visibility.h"
00020 #include "purify_image.h"
00021 #include "purify_measurement.h"
00022 #include "purify_types.h"
00023 #include "purify_error.h"
00024 #include "purify_ran.h"

00026 #define VERBOSE 1

00028 
00029 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00030 
00031   purify_visibility_filetype filetype_vis;
00032   purify_image_filetype filetype_img;
00033   char filename_vis[PURIFY_STRLEN];
00034   char filename_img[PURIFY_STRLEN];
00035   purify_visibility vis;
00036   purify_image img;
00037   purify_sparsemat mask;
00038   int nmeas, nvis, seed;
00039   
00040   fftw_plan plan;
00041   complex double *y_half;
00042   void *data[3];
00043 
00044   // Define parameters for simulation.
00045   filetype_vis = PURIFY_VISIBILITY_FILETYPE_PROFILE_VIS;
00046   filetype_img = PURIFY_IMAGE_FILETYPE_FITS;
00047   strcpy(filename_img, "data/images/30dor.fits");
00048   strcpy(filename_vis, "data/test/sim.vis");
00049 
00050   // Read image and set input parameters.
00051   purify_image_readfile(&img, filename_img, filetype_img);
00052   img.fov_x = 10.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00053   img.fov_y = 10.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00054   nvis = img.nx * img.ny;
00055   nmeas = round(nvis * 0.3);
00056 
00057   // Plan FFTW.
00058   y_half = (complex double*)calloc(img.nx * (img.ny/2+1),
00059                                sizeof(complex double));
00060   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y_half);
00061   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_2d(img.nx, img.ny,
00062                               img.pix, y_half, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00063 
00064   // Construct mask.
00065   seed = 1;
00066   purify_visibility_genranmask(&mask, nmeas, nvis, seed);
00067 
00068   // Compute continuous visibilitivy coordinates.
00069   purify_visibility_mask2vis(&vis, &mask, &img);
00070 
00071   // Apply full measurement operator (includes FFT and masking).
00072   data[0] = (void *)&plan;
00073   data[1] = (void *)&img;
00074   data[2] = (void *)&mask;
00075   purify_measurement_opfwd((void *)vis.y, (void *)img.pix, data);
00076 
00077   // Write visibilities to file..
00078   purify_visibility_writefile(&vis, filename_vis, filetype_vis);
00079 
00080   // Free memory.
00081   purify_sparsemat_free(&mask);
00082   purify_visibility_free(&vis);
00083   purify_image_free(&img);
00084   free(y_half);
00085 
00086   return 0;
00087 
00088 }
